com.adobe.cq.address.api.location

Interface LocationManager

  • Deprecated. 
    As of AEM 6.4

    @Deprecated
public interface LocationManager
    The LocationManager provides methods to retrieve, update, create and update locations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Location addLocation(java.lang.String groupPath, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> properties, boolean autoSave)

      Deprecated.

    • Method Detail

      • getLocations

        java.util.List<Location> getLocations(java.lang.String groupPath)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the locations belonging to a location group.
        Parameters:
        groupPath - The location group path
        Returns:
        The addresses or null if there are none

      • rankLocations

        java.util.List<Location> rankLocations(java.lang.String groupPath,
                                       Coordinates origin,
                                       boolean geocode)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a sorted list of locations ranked by closest distance to origin coordinates.
        Parameters:
        groupPath - The location group path
        origin - Latitude and longitude coordinates to rank locations against
        geocode - Flag that indicates if each location should be geocoded if it does not have stored coordinates
        Returns:
        ranked list of locations

      • getLocation

        Location getLocation(java.lang.String path)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the location based on its path.
        Parameters:
        path - The location path
        Returns:
        The location or null if it does not exist

      • removeLocation

        void removeLocation(Location location,
                    boolean autoSave)
             throws AddressException
        Deprecated. 
        Removes the location.
        Parameters:
        location - The location address
        autoSave - If true the operation is persisted
        Throws:
        AddressException - when the operation fails.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the location is null

      • addLocation

        Location addLocation(java.lang.String groupPath,
                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> properties,
                     boolean autoSave)
              throws AddressException
        Deprecated. 
        Adds a location to the location group.
        Parameters:
        groupPath - The location group path
        properties - The location properties
        autoSave - If true the operation is persisted
        Returns:
        The new location
        Throws:
        AddressException - when the operation fails.

      • updateLocation

        Location updateLocation(Location location,
                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> properties,
                        boolean autoSave)
                 throws AddressException
        Deprecated. 
        Updates the location.
        Parameters:
        location - The location address
        properties - The location properties
        autoSave - If true the operation is persisted
        Returns:
        The updated location
        Throws:
        AddressException - when the operation fails.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the location is null
